name: Crypts of Death
storyline:
This graveyard was cursed long ago, in the mists of time. 
 
A great war was waged on these desolate hills and forests. It was bloody and cruel, claiming many brave men and women. 
 
In the end, there was no victory for either side, and the war left this land cursed. 
 
The skeletons roaming this land are the victims of that war, and other terrors are coming through the portal. Witches who had fallen in battle have opened a gateway between the graveyard and the otherworld. 
 
The land is in desperate need of heroes who will banish these foul creatures forever...
summary:
Fight through the graveyards and haunted forests, crypts and tombs filled with unspeakable horrors! 
Spin the daily treasure wheel, visit the shop and take control of four different warriors and their powerful magic weapons.
